column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Vishrahd is looking at you impatiently.
Feed the hamsa appropriately.
Speak with Vishrahd.
You must be the substitute hamsa-keeper. Well, you're late! Feeding time was supposed to start bells ago! And a hungry hamsa is a noisy hamsa, as you can hear for yourself.
What're you standing around for? Are you going to leave those poor creatures to starve to death? Get to work! Chop-chop!
Here you go─one large feed bag, and one small. Hamsa of different stature have different diets, you see. And they're finicky eaters, to boot.

The smaller ones require only a simple mix of greens and grains. But our big boys also need a helping of silkworm pupae for extra protein. The foodstuffs are next to that wooden crate over there. Now get to it!
How many times do I have to explain it? The smaller hamsa only get greens and grains. The larger hamsa get silkworms as well. The foodstuffs are over there by the crate. Now, chop-chop!
Which bag will you scoop the grain into?
The small feed bag.
The large feed bag.
Neither.
Which bag will you scoop the silkworms into?
The small feed bag.
The large feed bag.
Neither.
Which bag will you scoop the vegetable scraps into?
The small feed bag.
The large feed bag.
Neither.
Dispose of the feed bag's contents?
Empty the small feed bag.
Empty the large feed bag.
Keep the bags as they are.
Are you sure you wish to discard the contents of your feed bag?
That particular food is already in your feedbag.
You unceremoniously heap feed into your bag.
The hamsa flaps its wings and its eyes light up with gastronomic delight!
The hamsa shuns the bag and stares blankly skyward as if forsaken by the gods. Perhaps the feed mix is wrong?
The hamsa stares off happily into space, its belly sated.
The hamsa is eyeing you expectantly...
Done already? Perhaps you're not as hopeless as you look. But you'd better be on time for the next feeding. Er, what was your name again?

<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? Wait, you don't mean... <Emphasis>That</Emphasis> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!? The adventurer who rescued Matsya from the beasts!?
My most sincere apologies! I never imagined a hero like you would simply be walking amongst us...and slopping the hamsa, besides! Heavens, my face must be so red right now...
Anyhow, er...I thank you for a job well done. Here's your pay for today's work. Now, I'd best hunt down the <Emphasis>real</Emphasis> substitute hamsa-keeper.
